title: Android 11 takes the top spot in 2022 distribution chart; Android 12 still missing
content:
Google has updated its chart showing the percentage of Android devices running various versions of the OS, but there are still no details about Android 12’s adoption rate.

more…

The post Android 11 takes the top spot in 2022 distribution chart; Android 12 still missing appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The first Android distribution chart for 2022 shows Android 11 in the lead, but no sign of Android 12's adoption rate.
